name: Smartphone Screen Replacement
description: We professionally replace cracked or shattered screens for iPhones, Samsung, Xiaomi, and other popular smartphones using high-quality, OEM-compliant parts. Our quick turnaround ensures you’re reconnected within hours.

name: Laptop Motherboard Repair
description: From power issues to RAM slot failures, we specialize in advanced motherboard diagnostics and chip-level repairs for HP, Dell, Asus, and Lenovo laptops. All repairs are done in ESD-safe environments by certified technicians.

name: LED TV Repair
description: We fix all types of display, audio, and connectivity issues in LED, QLED, and smart TVs. Our team handles backlight replacement, T-con board faults, and firmware issues efficiently for Samsung, Sony, and LG TVs.

name: Microwave Oven Servicing
description: Facing heating problems or electrical issues? We service solo, grill, and convection microwave ovens with precision. Services include magnetron replacement, circuit board repairs, and door mechanism fixes.

name: Air Conditioner Maintenance
description: Comprehensive servicing for split and window ACs including deep cleaning of filters, condenser coil washing, gas recharging, and compressor performance checks. Ensure better airflow and energy efficiency.

name: Camera Lens Calibration
description: Ensure razor-sharp focus by calibrating DSLR or mirrorless lenses. We use advanced focus charts and lens testing software for precise adjustments. Also includes sensor cleaning and firmware update services.

name: Smartwatch Battery Replacement
description: Whether your Apple Watch or Galaxy Watch drains too quickly or won’t turn on, our battery replacement service brings it back to life with genuine, warranty-backed batteries installed by trained professionals.

name: Bluetooth Speaker Repair
description: Get your Bluetooth speaker sounding great again. We fix common issues like charging port damage, speaker distortion, blown drivers, and water damage. Brands like JBL, Sony, and Bose supported.

name: Router Configuration & Repair
description: We resolve connectivity drops, slow speeds, and signal range problems. Our service includes firmware updates, port repair, IP configuration, and mesh router setup for both home and business use.

name: Washing Machine Drum Repair
description: Resolve issues like unbalanced spinning, loud noise, or leaking in front-load or top-load washers. We repair or replace faulty drums, belts, shock absorbers, and control panels.
